product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Well known and loved, The North Face Denali Jacket is an iconic style that offers maximum warmth thanks to its 300-weight fleece construction. Polartec 300 Series(R) recycled fleece is warm, lightweight and compressible; nylon shoulder panels resist abrasion when wearing a pack. Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Zippered chest pocket and hand pockets; drawcord hem and elastic cuffs. Standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Well known and loved, The North Face Denali Jacket is an iconic style that offers maximum warmth thanks to its 300-weight fleece construction.
